name: Labyrinth (itch) (Ivan Lecomte)
description:
Labyrinth is a little game made by Ivan Lecomte and Thomas Francisco for the Game Jam Round 2 by Backtrace based on the theme "Share knowledge".

Your role is to place little characters who have to escape a dreadful labyrinth with a traps and puzzles. If, unfortunalety, they die, their ghost can leave a little message to the next adventurers to prevent them from falling in the same traps or give them a hint for the puzzle they failed to solve.

Link to backtrace project instance
